Verna:
%playername%. I've been waiting for you.
Since the last time you came to see me, I've thought about it a lot. It's hard to imagine you came all way to this dangerous place just because you were curious. But I highly respect that you are capable enough to come to me safely after fighting all the Golems and Spiculas infected with the Laido Virus.
I may not be able to sate your curiosity, but let me make a proposal. I intend to pay up on my end, of course - this could be a little dangerous or very dangerous, depending on how you look at it.
